brigediyar shawendra silwa wisin anadun palamu karya sadhaka balakaya batahira werala thiraya osse thama meheyum diyath kaleya.ehidi itha wadagath sangramika upakramika sthana rashiyak athpath karaganna ladi.ee athara mannarama "sahal naliya" pradeshaya, widuthalathiw, nachchikuda kapi pene.2008 nowambar 15 wana dina palamuwana saha dewana komando rejimenthuda wishesha karya balakaye sebalunda pramukha palamu karya sadhaka balakaya wisin punarin pradeshaya ilakka karaganimin meheyumak diyath kota ema pradeshaya athpath karaganna ladi.[25]punarin sita nagenahira dishawata gaman kala palamu karya sadhaka balakaya 2008 desambar 31 wana dina paranthan mudaganimath samangama yudha hamudawata kilinochchiyata athulu wimata uthuru godabim piwisum margayakda wiwrutha wiya.[26]
